name: Power Outage (wawahwa)
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 111. Mini Jam 111: Colors² - itch.io The theme was "Colors" and the limitation was "You Are Your Own Enemy".

Instead of colors I made the lack of colors and your only enemy is a clone that follows your exact movement.

You  are in some sort of building where you were experimented on and had gotten cloned. Unexpectedly, the clone was a evil version of you that kills you if you get too close.  As you try to run away, there is a power outage that  makes all platforms and levels invisible. You have to feel your way around and imagine the level design.

Controls:  W, A, D, or Arrow Keys to move around. Space to jump.
